document.full_text: the poor showing of carol moseley braun in the chicago mayoral election has galvanized many blacks to push for new ideas and new leaders in the black community.
document.title: chicago news cooperative: among blacks, mayoral election forces a push for new ideas and leaders
lines_and_colors: the poor showing of carol moseley braun in the chicago mayoral election has galvanized many blacks to push for new ideas and new leaders in the black community.
